bfsztg_gui

Class GameCanvasMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • bfsztg_gui.GameCanvasMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GameCanvasMouseListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Listens on mouse click events on the Game Canvas (which is in the middle of the screen with the hexagons), then gives the processed information to the game logic.
    Author:
    fhenrir

      private int[] getClickedCellID(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Gets the X and Y coordinates from the MouseEvent, and runs a minimum search algorithm on the length of the vector pointing from the MouseEvent and each cells center.

      • getClickedCellID

        private int[] getClickedCellID(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Gets the X and Y coordinates from the MouseEvent, and runs a minimum search algorithm on the length of the vector pointing from the MouseEvent and each cells center.
        Parameters:
        e - the MousEvent to be processed
        Returns:
        array of x and y coordinates of the cell
